title: Making a banner.
body:
Guys im making a banner for a facebook page, that Im slowly getting up and running.
*The main purpose if for future videos to help myself improve- thus earning more feedback*

I plan on adding the Shurima icon in the middle of it.
Maybe my GW2 Charr aswell somewhere.

What do you think would look good on it?
I would like some ideas or notes.

replies.body: If it's for improvement maybe have the Bronze and Diamond Teir logos

I don't think so, as Im neither of the two.
I was thinking the unranked one, to symbolize getting better.

But at the moment I just have this, been going back and forth with it.
I want to do something in the orange area but have no idea what.
